title: Game crashing after game is over (before scoreboard loads)
body: Ive been having this issue for a while.  Sometimes when a match is finished and I click on continue, my screen goes black and my computer also freezes with my cursor in the middle of my screen.  Im not sure what causes this but it is really irritating having to restart my computer almost after every match.  Please let me know how I can assist fixing this issue if it is on my end or what information I need to show to see if it has to do with the game itself.

replies.body: I did recently switch to windows 10 and I did disable the game bar.  I will update shortly to document my findings.  Also I have a wired connection that is the highest speed I can buy currently so I dont think I should be having any connection issues but I will look into that given the gamer fix does not work

This is a strange issue because it sounds like you have a black freezing and freezing which can be caused by different things.  Some troubleshooting here can help rule out some possibilities.  As a first step, if you recently updated Windows 10, disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which could help with your freezing.  

Once that's been completed, the black screen suggests a connection issue failing to download assets so the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help with that.

Hopefully, this will get you back in game without problems!
